body_html:
@mcarilli can I use 18.06.1 docker which is the latest version that I can update to get your pytorch image by running docker pull pytorch/pytorch?

如果你不关心这个bug，只想使用pytorch训练的话，我建议试试这两种方法之一：
1、使用pytorch-0.4.0
2、使用torch.nn.parallel.DataParallel替代DistributedDataParallel

Translated as follows:
If you don't care about this bug and just want to use pytorch training, I suggest you try one of these two methods:
1 using pytorch-0.4.0
2 use torch.nn.parallel.DataParallel instead of DistributedDataParallel

body:
> @mcarilli can I use 18.06.1 docker which is the latest version that I can update to get your pytorch image by running `docker pull pytorch/pytorch`?

如果你不关心这个bug，只想使用pytorch训练的话，我建议试试这两种方法之一：
1、使用pytorch-0.4.0
2、使用torch.nn.parallel.DataParallel替代DistributedDataParallel

Translated as follows:
If you don't care about this bug and just want to use pytorch training, I suggest you try one of these two methods:
1 using pytorch-0.4.0
2 use torch.nn.parallel.DataParallel instead of DistributedDataParallel
